casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Aron HARPER. No. 337P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Oct. 8, 2015. Christopher W. Brooks, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Leslie S. Robinson, Greenville, Attorney at Law, for Harper, Aron. W. Clark Everett, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th of October 2015 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of October 2015."
